DisplayName.value: White River Tools of Citizenship - Leon's Modded SMG(Rebuilt)

Description.value: Gather tons of pistols to help equip the settlement, then repair the degredaded weapon to ultimately obtain a premium named SMG.

Author.value: Shouden Kalferas, Loosely derived from Royal Deluxe Vanilla+ Quests Modlet(Rebuilt by 7DaystoDie.JP)
